item.title: kate hater add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "Tact is the ability to tell someone to go to hell in such a way that they look forward to the trip." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "A purpose of human life, no matter who is controlling it, is to love whoever is around to be loved." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "We are an impossibility in an impossible universe." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "It's what you do that makes your soul." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "Memory is a complicated thing, a relative to truth, but not its twin." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Bret Easton Ellis
item.description: "I'm into, oh murders and executions mostly. It depends." -- Bret Easton Ellis

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Bret Easton Ellis
item.description: "I like to dissect girls. Did you know I'm utterly insane?" -- Bret Easton Ellis

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Bret Easton Ellis
item.description: "This is not an exit." -- Bret Easton Ellis

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Martin Luther King, Jr.
item.description: "Only in the darkness can you see the stars." -- Martin Luther King, Jr.

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Intelligence plus character-that is the goal of true education." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Believe only half of what you see and nothing that you hear." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Life is a disease: sexually transmitted, and invariably fatal." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "There are so many fragile things, after all. People break so easily, and so do dreams and hearts." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: kate hater add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "That which is dreamed can never be lost, can never be undreamed." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: kate hater add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "A half-read book is a half-finished love affair." -- David Mitchell

item.title: kate hater add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "Books don't offer real escape, but they can stop a mind scratching itself raw." -- David Mitchell

item.title: kate hater add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "A book you finish reading is not the same book it was before you read it." -- David Mitchell

item.title: kate hater add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "<i>Fantasy. Lunacy.</i> All revolutions are, until they happen, then they are historical inevitabilities." -- David Mitchell

item.title: kate hater add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "My life amounts to no more than one drop in a limitless ocean. Yet what is any ocean, but a multitude of drops?" -- David Mitchell

item.title: kate hater add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "Me, <i>I</i> want to bloody kick this <i>moronic bloody</i> world in the bloody <i>teeth</i> over and over till it bloody <i>understands</i> that <i>not hurting people</i> is ten bloody <i>thousand</i> times more bloody important than being <i>right</i>." -- David Mitchell

item.title: kate hater add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "We looked at each other for the last time; nothing is as eloquent as nothing." -- David Mitchell

item.title: kate hater add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "We have just enough religion to make us hate, but not enough to make us love." -- David Mitchell
